md:
giải nghĩa từ "funds" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Funds (noun) - Quỹ (tài chính)
	+ Meaning: A sum of money set aside for a specific purpose or project.
	+ Example: The government has allocated funds to support small businesses.
	+ Related words: budget, investment, capital, financing
	+ Synonyms: resources, assets, money, capital

* Funds (verb) - Cung cấp quỹ (tài chính)
	+ Meaning: To provide money or financial support for something.
	+ Example: The company has funded several research projects in the past year.
	+ Related words: finance, sponsor, back, support
	+ Synonyms: provide, supply, grant, allocate

Note: The verb "funds" is less common than the noun "funds", and it's often used in the passive voice, such as "The project was funded by the government".
html:
giải nghĩa từ "funds" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

  • Funds (noun) - Quỹ (tài chính)

    • Meaning: A sum of money set aside for a specific purpose or project.
    • Example: The government has allocated funds to support small businesses.
    • Related words: budget, investment, capital, financing
    • Synonyms: resources, assets, money, capital

  • Funds (verb) - Cung cấp quỹ (tài chính)

    • Meaning: To provide money or financial support for something.
    • Example: The company has funded several research projects in the past year.
    • Related words: finance, sponsor, back, support
    • Synonyms: provide, supply, grant, allocate

Note: The verb "funds" is less common than the noun "funds", and it's often used in the passive voice, such as "The project was funded by the government".
